price: (Rabbiin): “Dachii miila keetiin rukuti, Kun (bishaan) qabbanaa’aa dhiqataafi dhugaatiif oolu” (jedheen).
arabic: ٱرۡكُضۡ بِرِجۡلِكَۖ هَٰذَا مُغۡتَسَلُۢ بَارِدٞ وَشَرَابٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ur'kuḍ birij'lika hādhā mugh'tasalun bāridun washarābun
translations: (is a spring of) water to bathe
